items.todoItem: Know that Jesus is seated above at the right hand of God in heaven.
Seek the things that are above where Christ is seated.
Think about heavenly things and not earthly things.
Know that you are dead and that your life is hid with Christ in God.
Know that when Christ appears then we shall appear with Him in glory.
Mortify the members of your mortal body.
Do not lie to one another.
Be tolerant, patient and understanding with one another.
Forgive one another just as Christ has forgiven you.
Whatever you do, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus.
Wives, submit to your husbands as it is right in the Lord to do.
Husbands, love your wives and do not be bitter towards them.
Children, obey your parents in all things for this is well pleasing to the Lord.
Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger.
Whatever you do, do it heartily as to the Lord and not unto men.
Know that God shows no respect of persons when passing judgement.
